name: MeTV Card Games
description:
Relax, unwind and sharpen your brain with MeTV Solitaire. No ads, no subscriptions, no hidden fees!

MeTV, America’s No. 1 classic television network, brings you a retro spin on the ultimate one-player card game. MeTV Solitaire offers three unique ways to play. Draw one or draw three cards to stack up suits in Classic Solitaire. Shoot cards that add to 13 in Pyramid Solitaire. Unshuffle a deck from Kings to Aces in Scorpion Solitaire.

Stuck in a spot? Use a helpful Hint or Undo multiple moves. Keep track of your success with Records and Statistics.

There are games for all skill levels — and dozens of customizable themes, from Western and Sci-Fi to MeTV's own Svengoolie. Easily read the hand you were dealt with large print cards. See how high you can score! Download with the one-time fee and keep playing.
